MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA20 postcode area of Stevenson. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:59AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still investigating a possible underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:51 PM on Wednesday, 11 November 2020.
